name: Beyond Daydreams
description:
This game was made within 72 hours Face your nightmares! Fight against your Nightmare Demon and overcome your hellish nightmares.

The boss attacks with randomly selected attacks for each phase.
No need to aim, you just have to dodge incoming attacks and use your abilities with care.
Try again and again to get the fastest time!

Controls:
WASD / Left Joystick: Move
Shift + WASD / ABXY / Shoulder Triggers: Dodge

This game was made for Mini Jam 105: Dreamy
All programming was made by myself!

Use of game jam limitation:
The enemy has three phases with a main and special attack. Each phase has a amount of different attacks. Each playthrough one main attack and one special attack gets randomly chosen. There're a lot of different combinations possible, each fight is a little bit different.
